/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. On either side of the road, there are trees and buildings, adding to the urban landscape. The road itself is lined with street lamps, standing like sentinels along the way. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and the sky, creating a sense of depth and scale. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the various colors of the buildings. The image is a beautiful representation of a day in the city of Beijing.
